dialogue.text: Sonu checks items off on a clipboard as her snakes place item after item into the van.

dialogue.name: Sonu
dialogue.text: And yes, we have snacks if that's what you're asking.

dialogue.name: Niimi
dialogue.text: Oh, sick. But I was just trying to get the thing to happen.

dialogue.name: Sonu
dialogue.text: Nothing happens when I'm hungry! The snakes don't say anything!!!
